channel.title: Announce a restart
channel.description: Does anyone know how to make a script that would announce a countdown till the server restarts... And the ability to change the time to w/e the time duration is needed... This would be very helpful when trying to tell people I am updating the server and need to recompile for a few seconds.

item.title: Announce a restart
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

::update (update in)
E.G.

To update in 50 seconds
you would do

::update 50

Read full topic

item.title: Announce a restart
item.dc:creator: @big_b140 big b140
item.description:
@big_b140 wrote:

There is this thing called a “Server control panel” and it has what you need and more…but I can not give it to you…because i only have it on my server and I do not know where it came from.

Read full topic
